name: What The Spell
description:
✨It's time for the annual magic tournament! ✨

Up to four participants can compete in each round, and the goal is clear — Do not fall off the stage, while becoming the biggest magical creature till the round ends!

      

You must collect Potions which will change your size. But beware — being too big might also lead to your demise!

Be careful of your opponents! They can use dirty tricks in order to win — push you off the ledge, or block you while jumping in mid-air.

Players: 1-4

Local (LAN party) or Single Player.

Note: For the best experience, connect two keyboards to your PC

Designers: Neta Feldman,  Shahar Amor

Developers: Nevo Gat,  Roee Stoffman,  Federico Bielawski
